summary:
Arctic Monkeys are an English rock band from Sheffield, formed in 2002. The original members are Alex Turner (vocals), Matt Helders (drums), Jamie Cook (guitar), and Andy Nicholson (bass). Nicholson left in 2006, and Nick O'Malley joined.

They gained fame through the internet and their debut album, *Whatever People Say I Am*, became the fastest-selling debut in UK history. They've won many awards, including seven Brit Awards and a Mercury Prize. The band's fifth album, *AM*, made them internationally famous, and their music has been nominated for nine Grammy Awards.
title: Arctic Monkeys
